root: ^I have heard stories about the great hollowed knights who roam the tomb of Motermier.
^These knights once lived a life full of chivalry and valor who served the king.
^Now their souls have been replaced by the essence of the darkness that now inhabits our lands.
^Go kill one of these knights and bring me a piece of their equipment.
^I would like to investigate the origin of this evil. Perhaps the eseence still lingers on the posessions of those who have fallen by it.
^Stay safe out there. You are our only hope left.
